about.title: About Us
about.p1: SwissConnection.online was founded by Louis Henrich with a clear vision: to connect people in Switzerland — across linguistic, cultural, and regional boundaries. Whether you're looking for a service or want to offer your talent — this platform brings you together.
about.p2: Our website is completely free to use. SwissConnection.online is a non-profit initiative, driven by the belief that access to a strong network should not be a matter of money. All revenue generated through optional features or partnerships flows directly into the operation and further development of the platform.
about.p3: We believe that strong networks are built from real connections — between neighbours, professionals, and helpful people. SwissConnection.online is the place where trust matters and collaboration grows.
about.p4: Our goal is to build an active community in the long term that shows: the best help often comes from next door.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.principleText: The protection of personal data is a top priority for SwissConnection.online. As a non-profit initiative, SwissConnection.online does not pursue any commercial purposes. There is no intention to generate profit. The processing of personal data is carried out exclusively within the framework of legal provisions and is limited to what is necessary for the operation of the platform.
privacy.noSharingText1: Personal data is neither sold, rented, nor otherwise disclosed to third parties. Data is only transmitted to third parties if there is a legal obligation or an official or judicial order requires it.
privacy.noSharingText2: There is no commercial use of the collected data.
privacy.publicProfilesText1: User profiles created on SwissConnection.online are publicly accessible. All information that users voluntarily publish in their profile can be viewed by other visitors to the website.
privacy.publicProfilesText2: Users are solely responsible for the content and information they publish in their profiles. It is expressly recommended not to publish sensitive personal data in publicly visible areas.
privacy.emailProtectionTitle: Protection of Email Addresses and Contact Details
privacy.emailProtectionText: Email addresses and other direct contact details are not publicly displayed. This data is not visible to other users and is treated confidentially.
privacy.dataSecurityText: SwissConnection.online takes appropriate technical and organisational security measures to protect personal data from unauthorised access, loss, misuse, or manipulation. Despite careful security precautions, however, absolute protection against third-party access cannot be guaranteed.
privacy.userResponsibilityText: The use of the platform is at the user's own responsibility. Users are obliged to keep their access credentials confidential and to take appropriate security measures to prevent unauthorised access to their account.
privacy.changesText: SwissConnection.online reserves the right to amend this privacy policy at any time. The version currently published on the website shall apply.
privacy.consent: By using SwissConnection.online, users agree to this privacy policy.
